content: Although WQUXGA doesn't quiet roll of the tongue it is the next size up for 5:4 displays. In anticipation of screens with this many pixels I thought I better start the search now for a desktop background... Google does actually have a few images at this resolution: http://images.google.co.uk/images?imgsz=huge&q=3840x2400 Flickr has just one: http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=3840x2400&m=tags Wow, IBM built some! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBM_T220/T221_LCD_monitors
title: WQUXGA 3840x2400 desktop backgrounds
name: wquxga-3840x2400-desktop-backgrounds

comments.author: Craig Mayhew
comments.comment: Also, just discovered that bing has added a Wallpaper image size to its image search engine. This automatically detects your screen resolution and returns only images that perfectly match the resolution.
comments.browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.3) Gecko/20100423 Ubuntu/10.04 (lucid) Firefox/3.6.3
